ygData.messageBody:
I agree with you too... pets are nothing but trouble from when you first get
them at level 9. From attracting monsters, to just plain falling off
bridges when you are crossing the zone. I think somehow we should start a
petition, for example everyone on this list logs onto UO and does a /w all
shad, then ya tell all your fellow shadowknights(or just the ones above
level 9) to do a /petition requesting the spell changes. This way there
would be a large amount of petitions coming in from almost every server,
something verant, if they pay attention to paladin rants should not ignore.

About the soul reaver, all I can say is if its real jump on it :P, but keep
a look out, there should be better swords in the future.


>From: "Howard Chan" <howard.chan@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Pet for Lifetap?
>Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 19:35:42 -0600
>
>From: "Howard Chan" <howard.chan@...>
>
>I also agree. As of now, and maybe from now on, I will not ever use my pet
>again. Bringing the pet through Lower Guk would be something that no one is
>stupid enough to do. And since grouping is basically mandatory after level
>20 (or level 30 depending on what you fight), pets, in my opinion, is
>almost
>useless at that point. Sure, there is an occasional spectre that Bony might
>help, but it does more harm than good. If the change was made, I would be
>using the new Lifetap spells more than I would use the Summon Pet series.
>
>I always thought it will be cool to be a fighter with a pet. But seeing the
>SK downtime and the uselessness of the pet (doesn't attack in PvP and
>duels,
>train-makers), I quickly realized that the pet is nothing more than a
>novelty and needs to be replaced. Unless they change the mobs
>aggressiveness
>towards the pet being dependent upon the SK's level, I see no reason to
>summon a pet in a dungeon.
>
>
>
>
> >From: <coregimp@...>
> >
> >Shadowknights don't have
> >the diversity their exp penalty should grant. Lifespike (10 dmg) should
>be
> >a lvl 9 spell, vampiric embrace moves to 15 and then the level 12 necro
> >lifetap is at 22....sound fair? I like it. As of the moment just getting
> >the lifetap series would be too powerful...and I'd trade ol Gebeker in
>any
> >day for a way to heal myself.
